message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $15,000. I think it would be a valuable asset to you, and this is a competitive price.
Thank you for considering my offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $14,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is worth more to me than that. How about we meet in the middle at $14,500?

I appreciate your response, Alice. Considering the value I place on this product, I would like to counteroffer at $14,200. I believe this is a fair compromise that respects the value of the product while also being mindful of my budget.
